name: CUBO contra CUBO
description:
This is a board game that is impossible to play on a real board. Because here your piece and your opponent's piece mimic the board and if you don't pay attention you won't know where your opponent is, or where you are! Try to capture your opponent or go out the door of your color. Use a strategy and defeat your opponent.

Currently only the two player version is available, I'm working on the single player version (it happens that programming the AI is very difficult for me hahaha).

Thanks for downloading and I hope you enjoy it!
